backend/main.mo: Defines investment plans, AI insights, and lead types, initializes default data, and sets up Maps for storing plans and insights.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files for documentation or reference.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and dark theme CSS variables for the app’s black/red design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, fonts, favicon, and mounting the root React app.
frontend/public/favicon.svg: SVG favicon featuring a geometric hexagon-like logo with a red center and accents.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component that imports global styles and renders the AppRouter.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Dialog handling Internet Identity login with success, loading, and error states and optional onSuccess callback.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Dashboard header showing brand info and a sign‑out button that clears identity and cache, then navigates to landing.
frontend/src/components/insights/AIInsig: Displays AI-generated market insights with loading, error, and color-coded impact/horizon states.
frontend/src/components/site/AnalyticsPr: Shows animated performance metrics and a demo portfolio chart with disclaimers.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactSect: Implements a contact form with validation, lead submission, and optional lead list display.
Renders an FAQ accordion with preset questions and detailed answers about the platform.
frontend/src/components/site/FeaturesSec: Lists product features in cards highlighting AI, security, and analytics capabilities.
frontend/src/components/site/HeroSection: Provides a hero banner with background graphics, marketing copy, and CTA buttons for sign‑in or insights.
frontend/src/components/site/PricingSect: Displays investment plans with loading, error, and authenticated flow handling, allowing users to open an investment dialog after selecting a plan.
Renders the site footer with navigation links, social icons, branding, and a disclaimer section.
Provides a responsive site header with navigation, sign-in/dashboard actions, and a mobile menu using a sheet component.
frontend/src/components/site/StartInvest: Implements a multi-step dialog for confirming a plan, entering an amount, reviewing details, and showing success.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIInsights.ts: Fetches AI insights from the backend using react-query and the current actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInvestmentPlans.ts: Retrieves investment plans from the backend via the actor with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeads.ts: Provides a React Query hook to fetch leads using the actor, enabled only when the actor is available and not fetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeadSubmission.ts: Submits lead information to the backend and invalidates the leads query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks for retrieving and saving the caller's user profile with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles, theme variables, dark mode settings, accessibility utilities, and visual effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the user dashboard with stats, quick actions, and personalized data fetched from the user profile.
frontend/src/pages/InvestmentPlansPage.t: Displays the investment plans page with pricing sections and navigation to dashboard or sign-in.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Builds the public landing page with hero, features, AI insights, plans CTA, FAQ, and contact sections.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Shows the wallet interface with balance, deposit/withdraw actions, and transaction history.
frontend/src/router/AppRouter.tsx: Implements hash-based routing and authentication-aware navigation between landing, dashboard, wallet, and plans pages.
frontend/src/router/ProtectedDashboardRo: Guards dashboard routes by checking authentication, showing loading or sign-in prompts when needed.
frontend/src/router/useHashRoute.ts: Manages simple hash-based routing with state updates on hash changes and navigation helper.
frontend/src/utils/availableBalance.ts: Provides functions to compute a principal-based available balance with a special-case value and format it as USD.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, including feature updates for UI values, navigation changes, and investment plan flows.
